original_text: And they went about through Judah and gathered the Levites from all the cities of Judah, and the heads of fathers' houses of Israel, and they came to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 그들이 유다를 두루 다니며 유다 모든 고을에서 레위 사람들과 이스라엘 족장들을 모아 예루살렘에 이른지라

sentences.original_text: And they went about through Judah
and gathered the Levites from all the cities of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 모든 성에서 레위 사람들을 모았고

sentences.original_text: and the heads of fathers' houses of Israel
